boatiview.configuration.show_hands.toolt: Toggle whether the item in hand should be rendered whilst the boat is moving
boatiview.configuration.title: Boat Item View
boatiview.configuration.whitelisted_item: Items to display in Moving Boat

Items that will remain displayed in hand. Adding the character '*' after a Mod ID will include all items from the mod. E.g. 'modid:*'. If no Mod ID is specified before the '*' character, all items will be included. E.g. '*'
text.autoconfig.client.option.whiteliste: Items to display in Moving Boat
